title: Hired123
author: Hired123
created_time: September 19, 2023, 02:13:58 PMLast edit: September 22, 2023, 12:53:31 PM by Hired123
content: So..For the past 2 months I've played on xfun.bet. I won some, I lost some money but I experienced a lot of trouble off swapping xfun to fun. It took 2-3 days every time while it should be instant.In the telegram group of funtoken, they even told me to wait, because its weekend... On the live chat of xfun.bet they told me its not xfun its dplay casino.... I didn't know what to do. Also the layer on the xfun website didn't had any funds left, so I decided to cashout all my funds.But now I am waiting.. and waiting, and I had a contact named Shyla on Telegram. She promised me yesterday it would be processed, and then it was today... and now she says there is a issue with the bridge???It's all excuses, to not pay me. I just try to understand why Funtoken holds my money every time for 2-3 days, and now I try to cashout al my xfun, they just tell me there is a issue? And not pay me?That's not legal.I don't want to file a police report, or spread all the information with tx hash online... I could do that, but I rather have this solved since I loved playing on xfun.bet and my funds where (late) but credited in the past.This transactions should be instant, but somehow.. swapping the other way around (fun-> xfun) never brought up any problems.Now it feels like a exit scam... because I told them I don't want to play there anymore.They even blocked me from the funtoken channel.... that ain't normal. I did not say anything bad.Can somebody help me ??

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I could be wrong, but xfun.bet seems to be affiliated to FreeBitco.in which also looks to be related to xfun wallet, dplay.casino, fun token etc. FreeBitco.in have an Announcement thread. Maybe you can try messaging their representative to see if they can help to get into the bottom of the issue.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=143168

comments.author: Hired123
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on September 19, 2023, 03:01:01 PMI could be wrong, but xfun.bet seems to be affiliated to FreeBitco.in which also looks to be related to xfun wallet, dplay.casino, fun token etc. FreeBitco.in have an Announcement thread. Maybe you can try messaging their representative to see if they can help to get into the bottom of the issue.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=143168Hi.The owner of both of them is user wetsuit.I can't message him because im a newbie here...I tried to contact this representative... hopefully will be resolved asap.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: would you mind providing screenshots of your conversation with their support, withdrawal attempt, etc. to back up your claims? this would give people more context about your issue. also, I sent a PM to TheQuin(their active representative) on your behalf, just in case he disabled getting PMs from newbies.

comments.author: Hired123
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on September 19, 2023, 05:06:24 PMwould you mind providing screenshots of your conversation with their support, withdrawal attempt, etc. to back up your claims? this would give people more context about your issue. also, I sent a PM to TheQuin(their active representative) on your behalf, just in case he disabled getting PMs from newbies. Hi there,Thank you for the reply and sending the message on my behalf. I wish I could message TheQuin or Wetsuit myself. So these are the transactions (non of these went trough)https://polygonscan.com/tx/0xa981b7aadb8d80a659d076568af2346e85cc0d07a20204485e1a0d4872ffc196https://polygonscan.com/tx/0xff1852e45f099d68a3f40320b037335e11de70515f76953a10fe75ae802123b4https://polygonscan.com/tx/0x4deba819bab64dd0ede2127d951e8f80ff5a1dba4d4c4485dcc2c1efffc0bf67https://polygonscan.com/tx/0xc581c34f219bc56e553dfc07327bafae94aabf09db53ae443c932ac49c472ee2I cannot show the channel in Telegram because I am blocked there.. but I had a conversation with the support/host in private chat.. at least until she ignored me.These are the screenshots:https://ibb.co/H7smKTGhttps://ibb.co/ZThx2YChttps://ibb.co/y6PkcBXhttps://ibb.co/YQLnbBChttps://ibb.co/FD8qvJXhttps://ibb.co/3mLyJHNhttps://ibb.co/Pz8Dm83https://ibb.co/Mc4kWBKhttps://ibb.co/x3MXtVkI'm really confused. The total amount is like $25k. I wouldn't expect the founder of freebitco.in would agree with this happening with his token.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Hired123 on September 19, 2023, 04:32:25 PMHi.The owner of both of them is user wetsuit.I can't message him because im a newbie here...I tried to contact this representative... hopefully will be resolved asap.I Ignored Wetsuit because he has been offline for a very long time (Last Active:   February 28, 2021, 08:56:13 AM). Chances are that even if you had sent him a PM, it was unlikely that he would see your message as soon as possibleThanks to acroman08, let's wait for a response.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.created_time: September 19, 2023, 11:00:50 PMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 11:17:05 PM by JollyGood
comments.body: I have added correct links to the images the OP posted. The chat can be seen inside the thread now without the need for visiting external links and they should provide clarity over what was being communicated via the chat.It is important for them to have chatted with the OP in a timely manner even if they sent messages to update stating "we are still waiting for news and will update you as soon as we can". I think for the chat operators to go in to total silence-mode will be seen as unprofessional . If you read through, you will notice the OP was getting frustrated towards the end but when it comes to $25,000 that was bound to happen when he was not even being told something simple such as an estimated time.I hope they manage to resolve this as soon as possible because it is not nice to be in limbo, not even knowing if will see any of that money.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Hi, so I received a reply from TheQuin after I PMed him, he basically said that he couldn't help as he doesn't have anything to do with affiliated sites. he also, replied to your post on their thread on micro-earnings boards basically saying the same thing.sorry that there is not much that can be done from this side. I really do hope your issue gets resolved soon.

comments.author: Hired123
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on September 20, 2023, 11:46:13 AMHi, so I received a reply from TheQuin after I PMed him, he basically said that he couldn't help as he doesn't have anything to do with affiliated sites. he also, replied to your post on their thread on micro-earnings boards basically saying the same thing.sorry that there is not much that can be done from this side. I really do hope your issue gets resolved soon.Thanks.So in the meanwhile.. Shyla made me promisses again. As wel as the group CTO called Andrew Haigh.https://ibb.co/60pDw4bHe made me YET another promiss. To be clear, I am waiting since sunday. Every day since then, they told me today for sure, today for sure... I don't want to share ALL off the chats, but this is pretty clear I think.Is there anybody who's in touch with @wetsuit? I think he is the owner of the token and this company.I have all the prove. I don't hesitate anymore to file a police report. This is THEFT.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: It will not be an easy matter to start litigation, especially if you are on your own. If there were a group of victims (or alleged victims) getting to together to fight a joint case it would have been easier. Do you live in a country where you can walk in to a police station to make a report or will the process begin online? Quote from: Hired123 on September 21, 2023, 06:23:56 PMThanks.I don't hesitate anymore to file a police report. This is THEFT.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Why do you always say you don't want to share all the evidence you have and why did you say in OP that you don't want to file a police report! Am asking because this makes you look like you are hiding something and you are afraid of exposing it (usually because you realize it will make you a culprit).If you think the casino owners/representatives have wronged you then share all the evidence you have.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on September 21, 2023, 10:06:02 PMWhy do you always say you don't want to share all the evidence you have and why did you say in OP that you don't want to file a police report! Am asking because this makes you look like you are hiding something and you are afraid of exposing it (usually because you realize it will make you a culprit).If you think the casino owners/representatives have wronged you then share all the evidence you have.With all the screenshot that the OP shared especially the letter/chat made by their CTO i guess i obviously say that the OP is the victim here. Although i would advice to share all screenshots the OP made, from platform/in-app chats, platform transactions. Also, i would suggest you to file a police report for them to alarm and make you prioritize. Filing a report doesn't mean you're defaming them or what, it's your right after having a bad experience for days and obviously feel like you scammed.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on September 21, 2023, 10:06:02 PMWhy do you always say you don't want to share all the evidence you have and why did you say in OP that you don't want to file a police report! Am asking because this makes you look like you are hiding something and you are afraid of exposing it (usually because you realize it will make you a culprit).If you think the casino owners/representatives have wronged you then share all the evidence you have.Maybe he is trying to get his funds back without any hassle so maybe he wants to avoid reporting to the police. And here only got to know Op's side of the story, the casino representative has not yet given any information from their side. Before any decision can be made after seeing the information provided by both parties, it is difficult to find any real cause of this problem. Casinos often give various excuses for not giving withdrawals to gamblers, if this is something like that OP should definitely file a police report against them.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Hired123 on September 22, 2023, 06:51:08 AMQuote from: ScamViruS on September 21, 2023, 11:22:24 PMQuote from: khaled0111 on September 21, 2023, 10:06:02 PM~~Maybe he is trying to get his funds back without any hassle so maybe he wants to avoid reporting to the police. Casinos often give various excuses for not giving withdrawals to gamblers, if this is something like that OP should definitely file a police report against them.That’s true. The only thing is… this is not a withdraw. I had the withdraw, and then you’ll need to swapp te tokens because you can’t trade or sell xfun. So you need to swapp the xfun to fun in their wallet, and then my funds vanished. This creates a complicated problem for you and you are stuck on that site with your funds. Since the xfun token cannot be traded, you have swapped those tokens, so where did the withdrawal money go after swapping the token? This website is treating you in a way that is frustrating for any gambler. Is their support team still interested in helping you? If they are not willing to help then you have to take strict action against them. Because they are systematically thinking of not returning your money.

I wasn't even complaining in the group chat. The admins of the tg group are stupid. They tell me it could be a UI error. I don't know why they hired these kind of people. They blocked me also personally... Also.. 23k people are member but only 200 online? And only 10-15 speak? It's all fake followers.

comments.author: Klain_Grain93
comments.body: This must be a very frustrating situation for you, it's never nice to not have access to your funds, in any manner. I just find it really hard to believe that FUN would do something like this, considering the fact I'm an XFUN user too, for many years now, and have never had an issue like this one before. Are you sure you didn't talk to someone who actually wanted to scam you, I know there is another FUN chat on TG as well, which is a fake one
